pageContext.claim: “.@POTUS’ agenda is the most pro-business agenda from a President in history. It been a game-changer for the American economic landscape. As a result of President Trump’s policies, international companies & investors are already going full speed ahead with opportunities in U.S.”
pageContext.analysis: There's little evidence that Trump's policies have sparked international companies & investors to change existing plans. Many of the deals he cites were put in place before Trump took office.
